recipe.title: Southwestern Black Bean and Hominy Salad
ingredients: 1 15-ounce can black beans, rinsed, drained well
1 15-ounce can golden hominy, rinsed, drained well
instructions: Combine first 7 ingredients in large bowl. Add 1/2 cup salsa and toss to coat. Add more salsa if salad is dry. Season salad with salt and pepper.
